ing: 1/2 cup Honey Roasted Wonderful Almond Accents
n: Watermelon, Almond, Feta and Mint Salad
des: "This salad is fresh and juicy with sweet watermelon, tangy feta and crunchy honey roasted WonderfulÂ® Almond Accents."
ins: Combine watermelon, feta, mint, lime juice and olive oil in a medium serving bowl. Stir gently to mix. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Top with Wonderful Almond Accents before serving.
